attributes.review: so i downloaded this app and everything went smoothly until i opened it 😰😱😳i saw the most horrible monster appear on screen and i threw up repeatedly resulting in me having 2 consecutive heart attacks an aneurism and i went into anaphylactic shock. i’m currently in the hospital and i have 2 days to live.
attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: Due to the unfortunate event of me downloading this horrible, disgusting app 🤭which promotes racist, homophobic, transphobic, xenophobic(etc.) actions.🤢 And this man touches little girls. That’s nasty.🤮 So I advice anyone that supports trump to turn around and get back to they seat, what is wrong with they ashy selves.🧚🏽 And y’all better not vote for Kanye either.🛑🚫 Delete this app NOW❌‼️#BLM✊🏽✊🏾✊🏿
attributes.title: Stop, Get Some Help🛑

attributes.review: I downloaded the app so that I could hear about how great our country was but instead a I was greeted by a clown 🤡. If I wanted to see the fat pig of a cheeto man I would’ve just gone to a circus 😪 very misleading app, 1 star review would download again. But did you know that there’s still NO justice for Breonna Taylor? Go sign a petition
attributes.title: Misleading

attributes.review: I honesty feel tainted and violated even having this app on my phone. My virgin eyes started bleeding the moment I laid eyes on the naked Dr. Zoidberg starting back at me, his molted and slimy claw risen in triumph. I have never been so offended, disgusted or confused in my life. I hope this app goes up in flames just as he has set our country a flame 💕
attributes.title: Jesus save us

attributes.review: This app is literally terrible. The first thing I saw when I opened the app was something so terrible I can’t even put into words. My brain hurts just from looking at it 🤮 No one should have to experience what I did while using the app. Don’t even consider this app people. It’s that bad
attributes.title: Ew

attributes.review: The content shown wasn’t factual this app took so much memory space from my phone it also caused a glitch I seriously don’t recommend save the time and energy that you’ll need fixing all the damage it causes to your phone worst app ever!!!!!!!
attributes.title: Terrible content

attributes.review: the app has many glitches and bugs😞 these weren’t the only problems every time i open the app the home page would greet me with a cheeto in bad tupé saying and i quote “ welcome to ba sing se i am judee, there is no such thing as systematic racism in ba sing se😳” idk it made me feel like it was trying to brainwash me  and then the next page would be just countless videos of fox news anchor tucker carlson having a threesome with mike pence and the same cheeto from the home page🤮😐um so yay this app proved to be a waste of storage and should not exist at all😤
attributes.title: this app should exist

attributes.review: when i downloaded the app it took 90 days to download. then when it started to work my 1 year old daughter started chanting “trump is gonna marry his daughter” which caught me very much off guard. and when i opened the app there was a very disturbing photo of trump which showed him eating 100 chicken in his bed while naked. also since i got the app it turned my phone’s background to that same picture and it wouldn’t go away until i finally deleted the app. i worn you all do not download.
attributes.title: horrible experience

attributes.review: This app is awful and disgusting. It is showing inappropriate things and spreading false news. My eyes literally are not meant for that this app needs to be deleted immediately. I’m leaving a one star review because it’s that bad. please apple do something about this and help stop this.
attributes.title: One star review

attributes.review:
Keeping people in cages is inhuman, let’s also not forget the MANY times he’s raped children. If you believe that this white supremacist, child rapist, nazi, Cheeto should be president for four more years you have a serious mental problem. Worse then mine, here’s your gold star ⭐️

😍🧡Please💕😘Stop💋😻Killing🧚🏾People💓🥰of💛🧚🏾Color💚💋
